description: "If the world and the Lebanese government don't act... the IDF will do it," says Israeli minister Benny Gantz.
maintext: On the Israeli side, at least four civilians and nine soldiers are known to have died on the Lebanon border since hostilities began. Thousands of civilians living in dozens of communities in the area have been evacuated by the army.
title: Israel Gaza war: Israel warns Hezbollah and Lebanon over border fighting
